objective: Seeking a High Level Software Developer position that focuses on writing object oriented unit testable code.

workHistory.title: Senior Software Developer
responsibilities: Architected and Implemented a system for automatically assigning Primary Care Physicians to new customers
Responsible designing and maintaining automated unit and integration tests
Created several front end web pages for customer facing access to reporting and configuration data, using WebAPI and Angular
Maintained automated builds using Bamboo
Designing and maintained automated unit and integration tests

workHistory.title: Lead Software Engineer
responsibilities: Supervised a team of software engineers and database developers in the development of a .NET web application
Created web pages using HTML, Javascript, jQuery and CSS
Created server side .NET code responsible for providing  communication between SQL server databases and the user facing web pages
Initiated a three year effort to modernize a legacy web application and eliminate technical debt
Redesigned a web application’s architecture to use a tiered architecture consisting of data access, business services, and user interface layers
Integrated Entity Framework into the application as the primary data access technology
Upgraded the products build infrastructure to TFS 2010 Workflow builds
Created WIX installers for the product and all of its supporting services
Wrote fully unit testable code using the NSubstitute framework and MSTest
Conducted all work under the CMMI Level 3 software development process

workHistory.title: Software Devloper
responsibilities: Responsible for developing, maintaining, and debugging a large tax software product
Spearheaded a regression testing initiative which involved collaborating on an integration testing platform capable of running automated tests over nightly builds
Created a system for analyzing user data to create targeted integration tests that could efficiently maximize test coverage
Created small applications and scripts to streamline and automate routine task performed by the development team
Met time sensitive deadlines for coding cycles and product releases
Participated in producing software specifications and documentation

workHistory.title: Computer Engineer Intern
responsibilities: Aided in the design and development of a rugidized computer system
Involved in this system’s fabrication and implementation
Collaborated with design and implementation of embedded digital systems
Performed system testing and diagnostics
